name: Updated Remote Work Policy 2024
content:
Remote Work Policy Update - 2024

Effective Date: April 1, 2024

Overview:

SynergyOS is updating its remote work policy to better support our global workforce while maintaining collaboration and productivity.

Key Changes:

  • Flexible Work Hours

    • Core hours: 10 AM - 3 PM local time

    • Flexible scheduling outside core hours

  • Office Presence

    • Minimum 2 days per week in office

    • Team leads coordinate in-office days

  • Equipment Support

    • Annual WFH setup allowance: $500

    • IT support for home office

Requirements:

  1. Reliable Internet Connection

    • Minimum 50Mbps upload/download

    • Backup connection recommended

  2. Workspace Setup

    • Dedicated, quiet work area

    • Ergonomic setup required

  3. Communication

    • Available during core hours

    • Calendar always updated

Implementation Timeline:

  • March 15-31: Department planning

  • April 1: Policy effective

  • April 15: Full compliance expected

Contact:

For questions or clarifications, contact HR at hr@synergyos.com
